name: super(position)
description:
super(position) is a game about swapping and rotating. The mechanics are relatively simple: Click or touch an object to make something happen. Follow the prompt for each puzzle to complete an image or set of images.

Puzzles are separated into categories with increasing difficulty: A, B, and C. There is currently no way to save your progress, but there are no hidden puzzles you need to unlock.

This app is still in its early stages. Constructive feedback is appreciated.
